Package com.clarkparsia.openrdf

This package defines classes for working with the Aduna OpenRdf framework

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ExtGraph Extends the basic Sesame Graph interface to provide more concise access to various utility methods defined in Graphs or other interfaces as well as safer access to some methods that are functionally equivalent to what is defined in GraphUtil; nulls are not returned nor is GraphUtilException thrown for these methods.
FunctionalGraph Convenience interface for a Sesame Graph for applying some of the Guava functional objects to a Graph.
IOGraph Extends the standard Sesame Graph to provide some RDF IO methods for inserting data from input or writing the Graph out.
 

Class Summary
ConstrainedGraph A Graph which has a Constraint placed upon which statements can be added to the Graph.
ContextAwareStatement Implementation of a Sesame Statement which takes into account the context for ContextAwareStatement.equals(java.lang.Object) but not ContextAwareStatement.hashCode() so it is still compatible with default Sesame implementations.
ContextAwareValueFactory ValueFactory implementation which will create statements of the type ContextAwareStatement, otherwise it delegates creation of objects to the default ValueFactory
DelegatingGraph Base class which implements the Graph interface, but delegates all operations to a sub-graph.
ExtRepository Extends the normal Sesame Repository, via RepositoryWrapper, with some additional utility functions.
Graphs Utility methods for working with Graph objects
ImmutableGraph An immutable version of an OpenRdf Graph
OpenRdfIO Collection of utility methods for doing IO operations with RIO and the OpenRdf API.
OpenRdfUtil Utility methods for working with the OpenRDF Sesame API.
SetGraph Implementation of the Sesame Graph interface which assumes Set semantics as opposed to GraphImpl which uses a LinkedList internally.
Statements Some common Function implementations for working with Statements
 

Exception Summary
ConstrainedGraph.StatementViolatedConstraintException A runtime exception suitable for being thrown from a Constraint on a Statement
 

Package com.clarkparsia.openrdf Description

This package defines classes for working with the Aduna OpenRdf framework
